plot: The filmmaker films from his window in three Middle Eastern cities (Ramallah, Bagdad and Erbil) : the ballet of men and machines also tells a story of resilience.
title: Hams al moodun
plot_es: The filmmaker films from his window in three Middle Eastern cities (Ramallah, Bagdad and Erbil) : the ballet of men and machines also tells a story of resilience.
plot_en: The filmmaker films from his window in three Middle Eastern cities (Ramallah, Bagdad and Erbil) : the ballet of men and machines also tells a story of resilience.
